Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_GetAggregationData]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetAggregationData] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL =' CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetAggregationData] ( @DimPoolID bigint, @LTVPassNo varchar(50), @AggregationCategory nvarchar(200) ) AS Begin SELECT [AggregationCategory] ,[AggregationItem] ,[Value] ,[FormatString] FROM [dbo].[tblUIDataAggregation] where DimPoolID = @DimPoolID and LTVPassNo=@LTVPassNo and AggregationCategory = @AggregationCategory End'
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
